quizzes.title: Knowledge Quiz: Movie and Napoleon Dynamite
quizzes.description: Test your knowledge knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Knowledge, actor, john. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: What is the name of Kips girlfriend in the movie Napoleon Dynamite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: LaFawnduh

questions.question: Is it true that in the movie Napoleon Dynamite, Kip is older than his brother Napoleon?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: In the movie National Lampoons Animal House, Kent Dorfman is from what town?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Harrisburg, Pennsylvania

questions.question: Pedro, one of the main characters in the film Napoleon Dynamite, has two older cousins who help him win the school elections.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Does Uncle Rico from Napoleon Dynamite live in an old van in the middle of a field?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Yes

questions.question: Which actor spoke the words, Thank you sir, may I have another in the 1978 movie National Lampoons Animal House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kevin Bacon

questions.question: During the High School elections in the movie Napoleon Dynamite, Pedro runs for what position?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Class President

questions.question: What does Bluto, portrayed by John Belushi in National Lampoons Animal House, imitate in the cafeteria scene?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A zit

questions.question: Pedro, Napoleons best friend in the movie Napoleon Dynamite is from which country?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mexico

questions.question: Is it true that in the film Napoleons Dynamite, Napoleons friend, Deb, is a a mechanic?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: No

questions.question: This shy  Napoleon Dynamite character is portrayed by actress Tina Majorino.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Deb

questions.question: An the end of the movie Napoleon Dynamite, the protagonist dances to what song?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Canned Heat

questions.question: Why is a chainsaw needed in Dean Wormers Office in the film National Lampoons Animal House?

options.text: Delta House boarded up the entry way.
An overgrown plant blocked the entry way.
A horse died and its the only way to remove it.
Pledges dismantled an outhouse and reassembled there.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: A horse died and its the only way to remove it.

questions.question: What is the game that Napoleon plays throughout the movie Napoleon Dynamite?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: tetherball

questions.question: What is the name of the college in the movie National Lampoons Animal House?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Faber College
